DealInsertUpdateTestCase.InsertXml: <DealInsert xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="DealInsert.xsd"> <MetaData> <Timezone>CET</Timezone> </MetaData> <Transaction> <TransactionType>Automatic</TransactionType> <DealType>Electricity-StructuredDeal</DealType> <Portfolios> <Portfolio>API Test Customer</Portfolio> <CounterpartyPortfolio>API Test Counterparty</CounterpartyPortfolio> <BuySell>Buy</BuySell> </Portfolios> <ElectricityStructuredDeal> <InstrumentData> <ExecutionVenue>None</ExecutionVenue> <PriceBasis>NordPool System Price</PriceBasis> <PriceType>Fixed</PriceType> <FromDate>2014-04-07</FromDate> <ToDate>2014-04-13</ToDate> <Physical> <DeliveryArea AreaName="ENBW" /> </Physical> <TransactionName>ElectricityFlexibleDistribution InsertUpdate</TransactionName> </InstrumentData> <SettlementData> <FlexibleStructuredDealInformation> <TimeSeries> <TimeSeriesType>ForecastedVolume</TimeSeriesType> <Resolution>Daily</Resolution> <TimeZone>CET</TimeZone> </TimeSeries> <TimeSeries> <TimeSeriesType>ForecastedPrice</TimeSeriesType> <Resolution>Daily</Resolution> <TimeZone>CET</TimeZone> </TimeSeries> <TimeSeries> <TimeSeriesType>RealizedVolume</TimeSeriesType> <Resolution>Daily</Resolution> <TimeZone>CET</TimeZone> </TimeSeries> <TimeSeries> <TimeSeriesType>RealizedPrice</TimeSeriesType> <Resolution>Daily</Resolution> <TimeZone>CET</TimeZone> </TimeSeries> </FlexibleStructuredDealInformation> <QuantityUnit>MW</QuantityUnit> <Currency>EUR</Currency> <CurrencySource>Viz</CurrencySource> <Clearing>Electronic</Clearing> <ClearingCurrency>EUR</ClearingCurrency> </SettlementData> </ElectricityStructuredDeal> <DealDetails> <Status>Active</Status> <Trader>DealImport</Trader> <TradeDate>2008-09-10T21:22:23</TradeDate> </DealDetails> <ReferenceData> <Comment>ElectricityFlexibleDistribution; should pass</Comment> <DealGroup>API Test</DealGroup> <ExternalId>ElectricityFlexibleDistribution InsertUpdate1</ExternalId> <ExternalSource>XMLFileImport</ExternalSource> <TicketNumber>TicketNumber</TicketNumber> </ReferenceData> </Transaction> </DealInsert>
DealInsertUpdateTestCase.UpdateXml: <DealInsert> <MetaData> <Timezone>CET</Timezone> </MetaData> <TransactionPart> <SettlementData> <FlexibleStructuredDealInformation> <TimeSeries> <TimeSeriesType>ForecastedVolume</TimeSeriesType> <Resolution>Daily</Resolution> <TimeZone>CET</TimeZone> <ProfileDistribution> <VolumeUnit>MWh</VolumeUnit> <ProfileDetail FromDateTime="2014-04-10T00:00:00" ToDateTime="2014-04-11T00:00:00" Volume="365" Profile= "Base"/> <ProfileDetail FromDateTime="2014-04-07T00:00:00" ToDateTime="2014-04-10T00:00:00" Volume="365" Profile= "Base"/> </ProfileDistribution> </TimeSeries> </FlexibleStructuredDealInformation> </SettlementData> <ReferenceData> <ExternalId>ElectricityFlexibleDistribution InsertUpdate1</ExternalId> </ReferenceData> </TransactionPart> </DealInsert>

ExpectedResult.ErrorMessage: Inserting time series distribution with overlapping dates is is not supported. Data at time interval UTC 04/06/2014 22:00:00 is overlaps previous entry. Time series type name is Forecasted Volume
